snippet: Buffeted by a flagging economy, and bemused by incomprehensible markets, a writer is left to consider his words’ true value.
abstract: John Schwartz Essay contends he is buffeted by a flagging economy, and bemused by incomprehensible markets, and is left to consider his words’ true value.
lead_paragraph: Buffeted by a flagging economy, and bemused by incomprehensible markets, a writer is left to consider his words’ true value.

headline.seo: Nowadays, I Can’t Even Invest in My Words
headline.main: Nowadays, I Can’t Even Invest in My Words
headline.print_headline: I Can’t Even Invest in My Words
